name: Marc Feeley
content: Marc Feeley Marc Feeley Professeur titulaire (Full professor) Université de Montréal Dépt. d'informatique et de r.o. C.P. 6128, succ. centre-ville Montréal (Québec) Canada H3C 3J7 WWW : http://www.iro.umontreal.ca/~feeley/ Email : feeley@iro.umontreal.ca Tel : (514) 343-7477 Fax : (514) 343-5834 Bureau: 2389 pavillon André-Aisenstadt Research Interests Dynamic programming languages Functional programming languages Programming language design and implementation Parallel processing and computer architecture Selected publications Olivier Melançon, Manuel Serrano, and Marc Feeley, Float Self-Tagging.
